column5: Hey Guys,I am looking to spend some more time on our next trip to lac seul to target muskies, we are staying at the Kak camp around the end of july to early august. I have caught a couple in the past but am really looking into getting into them seriously this year. If someone would be willing to share spots I would be more than willing to give you some of mine in return.. also any suggestings as to what type baits and structure to look for would be great. I caught a good un on a point with some stumps around it last year.Take care guys!Feel free to email me..[email protected]
